definition: to cultivate/to raise/to form (a habit)/to acquire
to raise (animals)/to bring up (children)/to keep (pets)/to support/to give birth
to succeed/to finish/to complete/to accomplish/to become/to turn into/to be all right/OK!/one tenth
surname Cheng
to bring up (a child)

sentences.chinese: 养成好习惯，一辈子受用不尽。

sentences.english: Marius had preserved the religious habits of his childhood.
sentences.chinese: 马吕斯一直保持着幼年时养成的那些宗教习气。

sentences.english: An excess of zinc, for example, can interfere with absorption of other nutrients, including iron and copper.
sentences.chinese: 比如，过量的锌会妨碍铁和铜等其他营养成分吸收。

sentences.english: Don't let me form bad habits.
sentences.chinese: 请不要让我养成不好的习惯。

sentences.english: The contents of ten nutritive components of dry pleurotus eryngii were determined.
sentences.chinese: 测定了刺芹侧耳干品中多种营养成分的含量。

sentences.english: Abstract; Determinations of the major nutrient components of wild Bombax malabaricum DC.
sentences.chinese: 对攀枝花的基本营养成分作了较为全面的分析测定。

sentences.english: Drinking water throughout the day is an important habit to pick up.
sentences.chinese: 全天候饮水补水是个必须养成的重要习惯。

sentences.english: A:When did you form this hobby?
sentences.chinese: 你什么时候养成了这个习惯？

sentences.english: The people should be persuaded to become accustomed to observing the decrees of the anti-Japanese democratic government.
sentences.chinese: 在人民中，要养成遵守抗日民主政权法令的习惯。

sentences.english: This movement should be insisted on dismounted so as to form the habit.
sentences.chinese: 这动作即使在马下，也要保持，以便养成习惯。

sentences.english: I have acquired the newspaper-reading habit .
Besides, their nutrition components are rich, and can be exploited as a health potherb resource.
sentences.chinese: 同时营养成分丰富，可作为保健野菜开发利用。

sentences.english: Associating etiquette habit education is an important part of the foundation education.
sentences.chinese: 交往礼仪养成教育是基础教育的重要内容。

sentences.english: Hand in hand with reading, he has developed the habit of making notes.
sentences.chinese: 他养成了一边读书一边作笔记的习惯。

sentences.english: In his childhood,he lapsed into some bad habits.
sentences.chinese: 在童年时，他不慎养成了一些坏习惯。

sentences.english: The main reason for the slowly speed reading is the habit of reading silently many years.
sentences.chinese: 制约学生阅读速度的主要原因是多年养成的默读习惯。

habit becomes nature (idiom); get used to something and it seems inevitable/second nature

early to bed, early to rise/to keep early hours
bad habit/vice

self-discipline/self-regulation/autonomy (ethics)/autonomic (physiology)

conscious/aware/on one's own initiative/conscientious
